msbt.message: <100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOn" />This is your captain. We're almost to , so please prepare for landing.<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOff" /><10_8 arg="80" /> <100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOn" />Return your seat to the upright position and make sure your seatbelt is securely fastened.<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOff" /><10_8 arg="2" />
<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOn" />We'll be making a water landing, but that's OK because this is a seaplane.<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOff" /><10_8 arg="2" />
<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOn" />Local time is : . We've got clear skies and the temperature iscomfortable.<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOff" /><10_8 arg="2" />
<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOn" />Local time is : . We've got cloudy skies and the temperature iscomfortable.<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOff" /><10_8 arg="2" />
<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOn" />Local time is : . It's a bit rainy down there and the temperature iscomfortable.<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOff" /><10_8 arg="2" />
<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOn" />Local time is : . There's snow on the ground and the temperature ispretty cold.<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOff" /><10_8 arg="2" />
